title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-10.3 - Determination of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-10.3 - Determination of base percentages, current percentages and current base proportions

State Regulations

For the implementation roll and each subsequent roll, the
legislative body of each homestead assessing unit shall determine current base
proportions for each class or portion class pursuant to section
1903
of the Real Property Tax Law provided
that the sum of the current base proportions for each class or portion class
must equal one and each current base proportion must be expressed as a
percentage to at least four places to the right of the decimal
point. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-10.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
